data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Sangha-Mbaéré with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sangha-Mbaéré, Central African Republic

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Sangha-Mbaéré that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sangha-Mbaéré, Central African Republic.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Sangha-Mbaéré.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Sangha-Mbaéré, Central African Republic to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Sangha-Mbaéré to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Sangha-Mbaéré.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sangha-Mbaéré, Central African Republic has a population of 93,500.

We estimate Sangha-Mbaéré has 29,994 people who might know Jesus, 36,770 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 26,737 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 29,994 believers find a person of peace today among the 63,507 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”
